fields_of_interest: Trade, Consumers, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Sport
eu_initiatives: General Food Law, EU Nutrition Policy, Food Information, Food Safety, Food Innovation, Novel Foods, Food Additives, Better Regulation REFIT
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: BENEO is one of the leading manufacturers of functional ingredients for food and feed. Its products are naturally derived from agricultural raw materials such as chicory root, sugar beet, rice, and wheat and provide nutritional, technical and health benefits. BENEO continuously invest in research and development for the ingredients developed and produced, as we believe this is the best way to successfully and sustainable contribute together with our customers, partners, suppliers and employees to a better Nutrition and Health.
